message: Let's split it 60-40, a fair start to the game!
You're starting strong, but I'll take a bigger share this round
You're taking a bigger share, but I'm not giving up yet!
You're not giving up, neither am I. Let's see who blinks first!
I'm not backing down, it's time to make a move!
You're getting desperate, I can smell it. Time to take control
I'm not giving up yet, it's time to make a final push!

This is my final offer, take it or leave it!
You're making a desperate attempt, I'll take a chance
This is my last stand, don't expect a better offer!
You're out of options, I'll take it all now
